Topic.Title: Is there a way to delete reviews?

Posts.EditableText:
Nope.  Maybe the boss man can but...

It’s something I volunteered to do long ago but it never came to fruition.  Trolls and erred reviews should be delete-able.

That whole “freedom of speech” thing becomes quite a bugger I’m afraid.
